attributes.action: Abolish elections and let people vote for whoever they want whenever they want.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The top 600 most trusted people in the country at any one time can attend parliament, and the most trusted person in the country gets to be Prime Minister.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting. Please provide more detail and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
